amendatorysection.catchline: Life insurance; policy issued to credit union or trust; requirements.
amendatorysection.para: A policy issued to a credit union or to a trustee or trustees or agent designated by two or more credit unions, which credit union, trustee, trustees, or agent shall be deemed the policyholder, to insure members of the credit union or credit unions for the benefit of persons other than the credit union or credit unions, trustee or trustees, or agent or any of their officials, shall be subject to the following requirements:
(1) The members eligible for insurance shall be all of the members of the credit union or credit unions, or all of any class or classes of the members; and

(2) The premium for the policy shall be paid by the policyholder from the credit union's funds and shall insure all eligible members or all except any as to whom evidence of individual insurability is not satisfactory to the insurer.
